## Checklist

Please make sure you have done the following:

- [ ] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/awesome-frsky-ethos/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] I have searched the existing entries to make sure this is not a duplicate.
- [ ] I have verified that the project is related to FrSky ETHOS.

- [ ] The project is open source and publicly available.

- [ ] The description starts with a capital letter and ends with a period.
- [ ] I have added the entry in alphabetical order within its category.
